member.name: P:Elect.Web.DataTable.Models.DataTableModel.IsShowGlobalSearchInput
member.summary: Show global search input, default is true.

member.name: P:Elect.Web.DataTable.Models.DataTableModel.IsDeferRender
member.summary: Enable to make the search fast and helpful for UI render, default is true.

member.name: P:Elect.Web.DataTable.Models.DataTableModel.TableClass
member.summary: Table class, default is "table table-hover dataTable table-striped".

member.name: P:Elect.Web.DataTable.Models.DataTableModel.AjaxErrorHandler
member.summary: Your javascript function as string with params: jqXHR, textStatus, errorThrown. Ex: "function(jqXHR, textStatus, errorThrown){console.log(textStatus)}"

member.name: P:Elect.Web.DataTable.Models.DataTableModel.InitCompleteFunctionName
member.summary: Function name of Initial Complete callback. DataTable will pass "settings" and "json" to the function. Ex: initCompleteHandle(settings, json).

member.name: P:Elect.Web.DataTable.Models.DataTableModel.DrawCallbackFunctionName
member.summary: Function name of Draw callback. DataTable will pass "settings" to the function. Ex: drawCallBackHandle(oSettings).

member.name: P:Elect.Web.DataTable.Models.DataTableModel.FooterCallbackFunctionName
member.summary: Function name of Footercallback. DataTable will pass "row, data, start, end, display" to the function. Ex: footerCallbackHandle(row, data, start, end, display).

member.name: P:Elect.Web.DataTable.Models.DataTableModel.ResponsiveResizeCallbackFunctionName
member.summary: Function name of Responsive Resize callback. DataTable will pass "e, datatable, columns" to the function. Ex: responsiveResizeCallBackHandle(e, datatable, columns).

member.name: P:Elect.Web.DataTable.Models.DataTableModel.BeforeSendFunctionName
member.summary: Function name of before send handler, you can modified data before submit by this way. DataTable will pass "list name-value" submit to server as params to the function. Ex: beforeSendHandle(aoData).

member.name: P:Elect.Web.DataTable.Models.Options.ElectDataTableOptions.DateTimeTimeZone
member.summary: Config use datetime with TimeZone. Default is "UTC", See more: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg154758.aspx

member.name: P:Elect.Web.DataTable.Models.Options.ElectDataTableOptions.DateFormat
member.summary:
All response will apply the format by default. If is , every request will use the format to parse string to DateTime. Else will try parse string to DateTime by any format.
Format "dd/MM/yyyy" by default

member.name: P:Elect.Web.DataTable.Models.Options.ElectDataTableOptions.DateTimeFormat
member.summary:
All response will apply the format by default. If is , every request will use the format to parse string to DateTime. Else will try parse string to DateTime by any format.
Format "dd/MM/yyyy hh:mm tt" by default

member.name: P:Elect.Web.DataTable.Models.Options.ElectDataTableOptions.RequestDateTimeFormatType
member.summary:
Control the way to parse string to DateTime every request. If value is , every request will use the to parse string to DateTime. Else, will try parse string to DateTime by any format.
Value is "Auto" by default

member.name: P:Elect.Web.DataTable.Models.Options.ElectDataTableOptions.SharedResourceType
member.summary: Shared resource type to localize all and will be override by if set

member.name: P:Elect.Web.DataTable.Models.Request.DataTableRequestModel.Data
member.summary: Store all information by key/name-value from client side
